snippet: Two bombs hidden in a motorcycle and a car exploded inside a gated community on Friday evening, killing at least 9 people and wounding more than 70.
abstract: Two bombs explode inside gated community near Kandahar, Afghanistan, killing at least 9 people and wounding more than 70 others.
lead_paragraph: Two bombs hidden in a motorcycle and a car exploded inside a gated community on Friday evening, killing at least 9 people and wounding more than 70.

headline.seo: Bombs Kill at Least 9 at Gated Community Near Kandahar
headline.main: Afghanistan: Bombs Kill at Least 9 at Gated Community Near Kandahar
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Bombs Kill at Least 9 At Gated Community Near Kandahar
